title: Crashed during loading screen. Restarted client and still crashes.
body: Once I get to the loading screen, A bugsplat client appears. Even when I try to reconnect the bugsplat client appears instantly, so I thought restarting the league client would fix the problem but nope, the same thing still appears... BUGSPLAT pls help

replies.body:
Bugsplats are often the result of League having a hard time interacting with your hardware or with specific files inside or out of the League installation directory. Common culprits can be malfunctioning graphics drivers or problems inside your operating system. I recommend working through our [Bugslat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as it goes over the most common fixes for these issues.

Let me know if the guide was able to resolve the problem or not.

Well It was working perfectly fine yesterday, then I went afk and my laptop went to sleep. Once I came back it started doing this and I honestly don't know why ;/ I tried repairing League, but it still does the same problem and sends me to Bugsplat. I honestly don't know what to do at this point lol. Anymore help is appreciated
